messages.message:
Hello!

I've got a prospect from Ardius asking about our official statement regarding the impact of the log4j vulnerability.  Where can I find it and where should I normally go searching for things like this?
if i remember correctly @Blaise had posted something about log4j in the past
We have an official write up provided to all customers.Give me a moment to find it

Here is the formal write up: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1yAakOtVj5kN_5jC7KDoEYWtyRQasBEwqvSIkxvl701A/edit?usp=sharing
@Dan H, @zach.steele

One thing to expect. Since we published this, Elastic search has published 16.7.2 with the fixed version of  log4j. The workaround mentioned and currently part of our release will still trigger any security scan, as we did not release a patch with the fix, but have the workaround avoiding any risk included.
